column2: "Hm, I don't sense anything in this area. Oh! Hey partner, what's up?"
"Me? I'm on a mission. A simple reconnaissance mission."
"I guess it's just grunt work, but you need to do a lot in order to get permission to go to other planets."
"People with fighting ability get permission right away, but I prefer this kind of simple, steady work."
"Since I just started ARKS, this is more than enough for now. Later!"
